easydarwin.android.videostreaming

Class VideoStreamingFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • easydarwin.android.videostreaming.VideoStreamingFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback, android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, RtspClient.Callback, Session.Callback

    public class VideoStreamingFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements Session.Callback, RtspClient.Callback, android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback, android.view.View.OnClickListener
    The main class of Kaleidoscope Sender side. In order to compatible with libVLC player VideoPlayerActivity, use Fragment to display the main interface.
    Version:
    v0.1.1 Build on Sep 1, 2014
    Author:
    tiger

        Specified by:
        onClick in interface android.view.View.OnClickListener

      • PLAYVideoStreaming

        private void PLAYVideoStreaming(java.lang.String linkname)
        Start video streaming function: congigure the audio/video settings, then You need to call RtspClient.startStream() method to start streaming through RTSP commands.
        Parameters:
        linkname - The format is rtsp://server_ip:port/streaming-name.sdp, streaming-name.sdp is the unique identifier of the media streaming, and also Receivers request the this media streaming also with this unique identifier.

      • InvitationListener

        public void InvitationListener(org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPConnection connection)
        Invitation Listener: listening invitation from friends.
        Parameters:
        connection - XMMP connection for each connected peers.

      • stopStream

        private void stopStream()
        stop stream, You need to call RtspClient.stopStream()

      • popupContactList

        private void popupContactList()
        Select Fiends to Share the video. In this method, it calls MultiRoom.createMultiUserRoom(XMPPConnection, String) to create a chat room, then opens room-message-listenerMultiRoom.RoomMsgListenerConnection(XMPPConnection, String) and touch-annotation-listenerPAINTViewRoomMsgListener(XMPPConnection, String). Call PLAYVideoStreaming(String) to start media streaming and then sends an invitation to selected friends with MultiRoom.inviteToChatRoom(XMPPConnection, String, ArrayList),

      • PAINTViewRoomMsgListener

        private void PAINTViewRoomMsgListener(org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPConnection connection,
                            java.lang.String roomName)
        Touch-annotation-listener: draw circle on the screen accodring to the received coordinate, this coordinate comes from friends. then start a paint thread paintThread to draw circle.
        Parameters:
        connection - XMMP connection with each user
        roomName - chat room

      • popupReceiveStreamingLinkMessage

        public void popupReceiveStreamingLinkMessage(java.lang.String inviter,
                                    java.lang.String message)
        Popup received invitation information and parse the inforation to get inviter, subject and streaming link, If user accept the invitation, Start a new thread VLCCallbackTask and with the streaming link, call AudioServiceController.load(String, boolean) method to play (default play as audio).
        Parameters:
        inviter - inviter
        message - subject of invitation

      • getAllFriendsUser

        private java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getAllFriendsUser(org.jivesoftware.smack.XMPPConnection connection)
        Retrieve all friends: You need to call XMPPConnection.getRoster() method which returns a Roster object. Then using Roster.getEntries() method to parse all the friends.
        Parameters:
        connection - XMPP conection

      • onPreviewStarted

        public void onPreviewStarted()
        Description copied from interface: Session.Callback
        Called when the previw of the VideoStream has correctly been started. If an error occurs while starting the preview, Session.Callback.onSessionError(int, int, Exception) will be called instead of Session.Callback.onPreviewStarted().
        Specified by:
        onPreviewStarted in interface Session.Callback

      • onSessionConfigured

        public void onSessionConfigured()
        Description copied from interface: Session.Callback
        Called when the session has correctly been configured after calling Session.configure(). If an error occurs while configuring the Session, Session.Callback.onSessionError(int, int, Exception) will be called instead of Session.Callback.onSessionConfigured().
        Specified by:
        onSessionConfigured in interface Session.Callback

      • onSessionStarted

        public void onSessionStarted()
        Description copied from interface: Session.Callback
        Called when the streams of the session have correctly been started. If an error occurs while starting the Session, Session.Callback.onSessionError(int, int, Exception) will be called instead of Session.Callback.onSessionStarted().
        Specified by:
        onSessionStarted in interface Session.Callback

        Description copied from interface: Session.Callback
